Devansh Pandey

    Last Updated: Jun 9, 2024

    Hey! I’m Devansh. You can contact me here.

    • Currently: cofounding Standard Intelligence. We’re building conversational voice models; if you’re interested in that, consider joining us.
    • Dropped out of high school; studied PPE at Oxford. Started the Oxford Bread Society and helped run the Taylor Swift Society.
    • First employee @ the Atlas Fellowship (largest scholarship program in the world in 2022). I co-ran ops / finance / fellow selection and started a microschool called Atlas Academy. Also ran a 20-person hackathon in rural Japan last summer.

    • Ran the largest Science Bowl competition in the world.

    • Favorite books: the Three Body Problem trilogy, unequivocally.

    • Favorite bloggers: Patrick Mackenzie and Matt Levine.
